CDepthOfFieldFilter
public
IImageFilter
public
CRefCount
CDepthOfFieldFilter

Defines an image filter for performing depth of field

Image Filter Parameters
"MinStrength"  : float

Strength of blur at min distance

"MaxStrength"  : float

Strength of blur at max distance

"MinDistance"  : float

Minimum distance where blur starts

"DepthImage"  : IImage

depth image

Functions
CreateDepthOfFieldFilter
CRefObj<IImageFilter> CreateDepthOfFieldFilter()

Creates a filter that performs depth of field

Returns

Returns filter that performs depth of field.

CRefObj<IImage> CDepthOfFieldFilter::Apply(
IImage* pImage,
ImageFilterParams* pParams
)

See IImageFilter::Apply
